parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Draws an ellipse on the map. Just like with marker or trigger area, negative a and b will result in hexagon. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''drawEllipse''' [c, a, b, angle, color, fill] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [c, a, b, angle, color, fill]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> c: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - center of ellipse in format [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> a: [[Number]] - horizontal(x) radius </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> b: [[Number]] - vertical(y) radius </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> angle: [[Number]] - angle of rotation in degrees </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - line color in format [r,g,b,a]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER7</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p8</name>=<value> fill: [[String]] - fill texture file or [[Procedural_Textures]]. Note that the file texture will not rotate with rectangle, use [[drawIcon]] for that. If fill texture is not empty, set line color to white [1,1,1,1] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER8</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
<br><br>[[Image:drawEllipse.jpg|250px]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value><code>[[findDisplay]] 12 [[displayCtrl]] 51 [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["Draw", 
{
	_this [[select]] 0 [[drawEllipse]] [
		[[player]], 10, 10, 0, [1, 0, 0, 1], ""
	];
	_this [[select]] 0 [[drawEllipse]] [
		[[player]], -10, -10, 0, [1, 1, 1, 1], "#(rgb,8,8,3)color(1,0.6,0,1)"
	];
	_this [[select]] 0 [[drawEllipse]] [
		[[player]], -10, -10, 90, [0, 0, 1, 1], ""
	];
}];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[drawArrow]], [[drawIcon]], [[drawLine]], [[drawRectangle]], [[drawPolygon]], [[drawTriangle]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
